Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of three lines of black-painted demotic text, dated year 30 (?).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394960) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394960)
